text: Diggah Nastootiy Ninkittinaane tascasse dirabboyseeh tet nummaysaamak kaxxamariinite marah addunyal ken taamah Qaran afoofi mafakkintaay raban waqdi ken Roocitteh mafakkinta, usun jannat maculan Rakub erbat Boohak cullu iyyam fanah, (woh takkem hinna) umeynit tamannah tan galt√≥h galatna Akeeral
